snippet: In the programs, singers are allowed to build their own 45-minute sets, leading to some unpredictable sounds.
abstract: David Allen reviews program of performances in Resonant Bodies Festival at Abrons Arts Center, including premiere of Jonathan Sokol’s Basic Lands.
lead_paragraph: In the programs, singers are allowed to build their own 45-minute sets, leading to some unpredictable sounds.

headline.main: Review: The Resonant Bodies Festival Completes Its Third Year
headline.print_headline: Clicks, Clunks, Plops, Shrieks, Wails, Gargles and Rasps (and It’s All Song)
